kiwi.ui
Class TreeTable

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JTable
                  kiwi.ui.TreeTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.CellEditorListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.Scrollable, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.event.TableColumnModelListener, javax.swing.event.TableModelListener
public class TreeTable
extends javax.swing.JTable

A composite tree/table component. This class is an extension of JTable in which the first column presents information in a hierarchical form analogous to JTree (but not necessarily implemented as such).

See FilesystemTableView for an example of TreeTable.

Author:
Mark Lindner, PING Software Group
See Also:
FilesystemTableView, Serialized Form
